options.content:
Istio
Istio is an open platform that provides a uniform way to secure, connect, and monitor microservices.
Need help? Join the Istio community.

targets.expr: label_join((histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)), "destination_workload_var", ".", "destination_workload", "destination_workload_namespace")

label_join((histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)), "destination_workload_var", ".", "destination_workload", "destination_workload_namespace")

label_join((histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cloud="$cloud",reporter="source"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)), "destination_workload_var", ".", "destination_workload", "destination_workload_namespace")
